section.name: WOLips
section.p: download install wizards manipulating the build process bugs and known issues inside WOLips

section.name: Bugs
section.p: No imgages in the Eclipse help.

section.name: Known Issues
section.p: Currently you can not use the ant scripts outside of Eclipse.
There seems to be some problems with Java 1.4.
Make sure that there is no older version of Xerces in your classpath.
Please use a 1.4* version of ant to build wolips. There is currently no support for ant1.5.* within Eclipse.
